Package de.aicard.Social

Class Message

java.lang.Object
de.aicard.Social.Message
public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
The class message is used to store informations about a message which are : the message its self - the sender - the time it was sent - the number of likes and the people who liked this message as a list
Author:
Amine Semlali

    Constructor Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void clickLike​(Account _account)
    the function clickLike checks if a person is in the list of those who liked the message if the person liked the message, his name is removed from the list (dislike) if the person didn't like the message,his name is added to the list (like)
    java.util.ArrayList<Account> getLikedBy()
    The function getLikedBy is used to get the list of the persons that liked the message
    int getLikes()
    the function getLikes return the number of likes that a message has

    java.time.LocalDateTime getTime()

      public Message​(java.lang.String _newMessage, Account _newSender)
      Constructor of a Message.
      Parameters:
      _newSender - the person that sends the message
      _newMessage - the message to send likes are initialized to 0 and time is the time the message was sent
